posts.name: Thiago Lima
posts.cooked:
I am currently facing a problem with the x86 and x86_64 emulator for android. After building the app, after entering the verification code, the app closes showing the error below:

posts.name: Thiago Lima
posts.cooked:
Update

  • To solve problem use HAXM 7.6.5 version鹿. The newer version 7.8.0 not install if you click in android SDK tools.

鹿 Release HAXM v7.6.5 路 intel/haxm 路 GitHub
